page.title: 08LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: The only large firm in S. Anston is Kirkby Central who supply and service coaches and vans.Several small firms are run from the village. Other firms are at Kiveton Park station, between S.Anston and Kiveton. Unbrako Steel, which is a subsidiary of an American company, makes special steels. They often manufacture to the customer's own specification. Unbrako steel was used in parts of the space shuttle. Steetlys are a quarrying firm. In a disused quarry they make reconstituted stone - sold as 'Anstone'. DMS Electronics occupy the old station master's house but soon will be moving to larger premises. They Design, Manufacture and Service electronic and computer systems. Fyffes, fruit importers, have a warehouse in the old station yard.
